summary: THERE IS A FOUL SMELL COMING FROM THE AC VENT ALMOST LIKE AMMONIA.  MY ALTERNATOR WAS REPLACED AT 37000 MILES, AFTER HAVING IT "CHECKED" BY THE DEALERSHIP FOR LOW VOLTAGE.  CAR SHAKES AT 55 MPH ON HIGHWAY AFTER ROTATION, ALIGNMENT, AND AFTERMARKET WHEELS.  SCRATCHES ON PASSENGER WINDOW FROM ROLLING IT UP AND DOWN.    *NLM
